        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        wages: - a list of weekly payments/wages entered
        expenses: - a list of weekly expenses
        See Also:
        Wages.getWeeklyPayList(), Expenses.getExpensesList()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateEarnings

        public void calculateEarnings()
        Works out actual earnings for tax purposes. In addition to working out actual earnings, this method also checks that the number of elements in Wages and Expenses are the same. If not, either list is updated accordingly with zero on the assumption there were no values entered for the corresponding entity. This is to prevent an IndexOutOfBoundsException.

      • getEarningsList

        public java.util.List<java.math.BigDecimal> getEarningsList()
        returns a list view of earnings calculated to date based on Wages and Expenses.
        Returns:
        list of type BigDecimal rounded up with RoundingMode.HALF_UP

      • getTotalEarnings

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalEarnings()
        returns a sum total of earnings to date.
        Returns:
        type BigDecimal
